title: Anime World
lyrics:
I wish they called a dragon land
Her dragonberry's
Black and blue like Larry
Find these bitches wanna marry me
Scream my name like Jerry (like Jerry, oh)
I defy gravity, in her mouth like cavity

Took a bitch from [?]

Now she appreciate me, yeah

Yeah



SahBabii! [?]



I got swords on my back, samurai attack

Ninjas with me nigga, throwin' stars at these bitches (oh yeah)

Eating ramen noodles in the hood with my ninjas (believe it)

All these bitches wanna turn up 'cause I'm with my ninjas

I'm in Anime world, I got Anime girls

Big tits on my bitches (yeah), big eyes on my bitches (uh woah)

Big ass on my bitches (oh yeah yeah)

RIP Nujabes, nine tails a Jinchuriki

I swear I'm speakin' Japanese



Oushi mushi oushi gooshi

My bitch is naked, cookin' sushi

Konichiwa, here go my Uzi (brr)

I don't know Japanese, bitch just get on your knees

Yeah [?] P-L-E-A-S-E

I got [?] bless me

Cut you like glass if you test me

Bitches can't press my buttons

I'm an iPhone 7, I'm not goin' to Heaven

Fuckin' before marriage (is it too late to go celibate?)

I see through these bitches like skeletons

Black Glock, call it melanin

Every girl thicker than medicine

Killin' these niggas, my regimen

Headbutt a nigga like Evelyn

Help him see light like Edison

These niggas filled with estrogen

Orochimaru, snake a nigga

Ayy, just like gaara, can't play with niggas

I'm in Anime World every day, nigga

They call me J 'cause behind me is a K, nigga



I got swords on my back, samurai attack

Ninjas with me, niggas throwin' stars at these bitches

Eating ramen noodles in the hood with my ninjas (believe it)

All these bitches wanna turn up 'cause I'm with my ninjas

I'm in Anime world, I got Anime girls

Big tits on my bitches (yeah), big eyes on my bitches (uh woah)

Big ass on my bitches (yeah yeah)

RIP Nujabes, nine tails a Jinchuriki

I swear I'm speakin' Japanese



Yeah, sharingan, rinnegan

Byakugan, tenseigan

8 trigrams, 64 palms

I'ma hit that bitch like Neji, eat that bitch like veggies

I go ape, Jumanji, Susanoo, Itachi

I dress like Akatsuki, they copycats, Kakashi

And I'ma hit it like Rock Lee, dressed in green like broccoli

Now they tryna pop me, chakra strong, can't stop me



I got swords on my back, samurai attack

Ninjas with me, niggas throwin' stars at these bitches (oh yeah)

Eating ramen noodles in the hood with my ninjas (believe it)

All these bitches wanna turn up 'cause I'm with my ninjas

I'm in Anime world, I got Anime girls

Big tits on my bitches (yeah), big eyes on my bitches (uh woah)

Big ass on my bitches (oh yeah yeah)

RIP Nujabes, nine tails a Jinchuriki

I swear I'm speakin' Japanese
